page.title: 10Spring/Summer on the farm
page.content: {SPRING} In spring a lot of the farmers time is taken up with lambing in one of the large lambing sheds. He is also putting fertilizer on both arable and pasture land and planting some of the corn crops. The cattle and sheep are put out as the grass begins to grow and the crops already growing are sprayed to control weeds and diseases. {SUMMER} In summer the farmer mows some of the pasture land to make silage, whilst in good weather he also makes hay for animal feed. The crops are sprayed to control diseases and some of the lambs and cattle are sent to market.
